### Seasonal Aids to Navigation Tenders Issued

!!! Important
* Solicitation Number: 30002582
* Closing Date: 2022-10-04 14:00:00

#### Tender Overview

Fisheries and Oceans Canada has issued a tender for the placement, lifting/ removal, maintenance, and servicing of seasonal aids to navigation on the Stuart Lake System. This requirement is issued under the Request for Proposal (RFP) procurement method.

#### Key Contract Details

* Contracting Authority: Fisheries and Oceans Canada, Canadian Coast Guard Sector
* Trade Agreement: The proposed contract is subject to various free trade agreements, including the Canada-Panama, Canada-Peru, Canada-Honduras, Canada-Colombia, and Canadian Free Trade Agreement.
* Contract Period: The initial contract term is from the award date to March 31, 2023, with the option to extend for three additional one-year periods.
* Workplace: The work will be primarily conducted in British Columbia, Canada.

#### Tender Requirements

The contractor must perform the following activities:

* Place seasonal buoys on their designated positions before the commencement of the navigation season.
* Maintain the position and operation of both buoys and lanterns.
* Repair, reposition, and replace buoys as required.
* Perform routine maintenance on fixed aids, including servicing lanterns and brushing.
* Submit Buoy/Beacon Service Reports through the SIPA mobile database.

#### Supporting Materials

The solicitation package, including the RFP document and technical data sheet, is available for download:
